Basic Pasta Recipe
Ingredients:
8 ounces (about 225 grams) of your preferred pasta shape (e.g., spaghetti, penne, fusilli) Salt, to taste Water, for boiling Instructions:
Fill a large pot with water and bring it to a boil over high heat. Add salt to the boiling water.
Once the water reaches a rolling boil, add the pasta to the pot. Stir gently to prevent the pasta from sticking together.
Cook the pasta according to the package instructions or until it reaches your desired level of tenderness. Cooking times may vary depending on the type and thickness of the pasta.
While the pasta is cooking, prepare any desired sauce or toppings to serve with it.
Once the pasta is cooked, carefully drain it in a colander to remove the water.
Transfer the drained pasta back to the pot or a serving dish. Toss it with your preferred sauce or toppings.
Serve the pasta immediately while it's still hot.
Note: The cooking time and amount of salt needed may vary depending on the type of pasta and personal preference. It's always a good idea to follow the instructions on the pasta packaging for best results.
